short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Manage your Kalay VSaaS Home surveillance cameras

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Kalay VSaaS is a Cloud Recording Service powered by TUTK, specially for built for P2P IP camera series. Thanks to unique P2P connection technology that users are able to watch live video on iPhone from any purchased IP camera by simply enter camera's ID and password; and with Kalay VSaaS, users can enjoy secure and reliable cloud recording service anywhere via internet. No complex IP or router settings required. The video compressed in H.264, MPEG4, MJPEG format and support up to Full HD video which guarantee for crystal clear video.
